sub_title: Section Manager L&F at Nouryon R&D Natural Resources
summary:
A PhD Chemistry and MBA graduate with extensive chemical technology/product development, implementation and management experience. Provides innovative and practical solutions to technical challenges in a business environment.

Career highlights:
•	More than 25 years’ corporate R&D experience in chemicals, fuels & lubricants, catalysis, technology/product development and implementation at Sasol and Nouryon, both large international chemical companies.
•	Fuels Research Manager at Sasol Technology – Responsible for managing and coordinating all application and other research activities on fuels, lubricants and associated products within Sasol 
•	Chemical Conversions Manager at Sasol Group Technology – Managing the chemical technology development/selection and operational support (from a chemistry perspective) for all Sasol’s South African based chemical operations.
• L&F R&D Section Manager at Nouryon – Leading the lubricant and fuels product innovation activities at Nouryon.
•	Founder of a catalysis research group on selective co-monomer chemistry that lead to the development of novel technology for the on-purpose production of 1-octene which was successfully commercialized in 2014.
•	Recipient of national innovation awards from both the South African Chemical Institute (SACI) and the South African Institute of Chemical Engineers (SAICHE).
•	Co-inventor of 13 WO patents and co-author of 33 scientific peer reviewed publications.
